topic.title: 可以开发一个可以在openwrt或LEDE上运行的zeronet吗？
topic.body: 这样就一直在线，而且同步非常容易。手机版本的太耗流量。PC端的因为不能一直在线，每次同步时间都比较久。

topic.title: No forwarding function, if can learn from the Weibo forwarding function is very fine.
topic.body: No forwarding function, if can learn from the Weibo forwarding function is very fine.

topic.title: Network synchronization needs to remove characteristics
topic.body:
now in China almost can't use zeronet. gfwl can detect the network message and block it. 
Network synchronization of zeronet needs to be removed characteristics.  just like shadowsocks. or let it just like the https message.

topic.title: The new Version: 0.7.0 r4188 has bug with nginx and ssl
Is it possible to share zeronet with others by VPS
topic.body:
Is it possible to let others to use zeronet by private proxy? For example, I deploy zeronet on my VPS. My friends can use my VPS to register and login zeronet, just as twitter. And he also can use same ID to login through other person's private VPS.
If zeronet can support this function, will solve the GFW problem. Because there will be a lot of private VPS to support zeronet. And GFW can't block them.

1604067473_mirrored_tianlichunhong_githu.body:
> Try adding the following to zeronet.conf to `[global]` section:
> 
> ```
> ui_host =
>  www.xxx.com
> ```

this also not work. I have use this configuration.

1604067479_mirrored_tianlichunhong_githu.body:
> Sure. Just setup a public ZeroNet proxy and enable UiPassword plugin.

I had used this configuration. However, it is not suitable for the multi-person sharing mode.

> Have you ever enabled the Multiuser plugin?
> You can bind ZeroNet to 127.0.0.1 then share it with port mapping progs (such as dokodemo-door protocol offerred by [V2Ray](https://v2ray.com/chapter_02/protocols/dokodemo.html), but I did'nt find any GUI's support customed inbound configuration till now), assuming you want keep your ZeroNet Proxy in private.



> Have you ever enabled the Multiuser plugin?
> You can bind ZeroNet to 127.0.0.1 then share it with port mapping progs (such as dokodemo-door protocol offerred by [V2Ray](https://v2ray.com/chapter_02/protocols/dokodemo.html), but I did'nt find any GUI's support customed inbound configuration till now), assuming you want keep your ZeroNet Proxy in private.

Multiuser plugin is only for a person use different ID. It is not suitable to the scenario where multiple users use multiple IDs.
